alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:00AM CST until January 29 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River at Macon. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Significant overflow into lowland and cattle grazing land near the Highway 45 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 27.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 29.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Noxubee River Macon 28.0 27.1 Fri 8 am CST 26.1 29.2 26.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
